==Trivia==
* The composition of this soundtrack was adapted from composer Yu-Peng Chen's single ''{{zh|旅人}}'' ("Traveler"), which was released in 2018. The song is available on [https://music.163.com/#/song?id=542718890 NetEase Cloud Music] and [https://www.bilibili.com/video/av20230565 Bilibili].
